channel.description: Recent content in Postgresql on Tech Chronicles...

item.title: A Seamless Upgrade: Cloud-Native PostgreSQL Database Version 15 to 16
item.description: Introduction #In the ever-evolving landscape of cloud-native technologies, staying up-to-date with the latest software versions is crucial for ensuring optimal performance, security, and access to new features.

item.title: Upgrading PostgreSQL in Kubernetes
item.description: I have been running an instance of bitnami’s version of Postgresql 12 for a while, and I have recently upgraded/migrated data from version 12 to 15.
